explains: n. （基督教指耶稣的）救赎，赎罪；（从过失或罪恶中）拯救人的事物；兑换；弥补
wordGroup: shawshank redemption 肖申克的救赎（电影名称）
beyond redemption 不可救药；不可挽回

sentences.en: He craves redemption for his sins.

sentences.en: Some specialized securities possess mandatory redemption features.
